articles.title: Kris Letang, Pittsburgh Penguins reach six-year, $36.6 million extension
articles.description: Kris Letang's new six-year extension with the Penguins runs through the 2027-28 season and is worth an average of $6.1 million per season. He has been with the team since being selected in the third round of the 2005 NHL Entry Draft.
articles.content:
The Pittsburgh Penguins have signed veteran defenseman Kris Letang to a six-year, $36.6 million extension, general manager Ron Hextall announced Thursday.

articles.title: Detained WNBA star Brittney Griner pleads guilty to drug charges in Russia
articles.description: Detained WNBA star Brittney Griner has pleaded guilty to drug charges in a Russian court that could result in a 10-year prison sentence, saying "there was no intent" and that "I didn't want to break the law."
articles.content:
Brittney Griner pleaded guilty to bringing hashish oil into Russia on Thursday, telling a judge that she had done so "inadvertently" while asking the court for mercy.
